column2: "Nna Jona fi nam no ne yamu bɔɔ mpaa maa EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn."

column3: Mifi m'ahohia mu musui frɛɛ EWURADZE
column4: Na ɔgyee mo do; Mifi samanadze no bun mu tseaa mu

column2: "Na ɔwo toow me kyeen bun mu
column4: Na esuyirii twaa mo ho hyiae; W'asorɛkye na w'eminiminim nyina bui faa mo do."

column3: Wɔatow me efi w'enyim akyen; Naaso mokɔbɔ do mahwɛ w'asɔrdan krɔnkrɔn no no kwan do."
bodur ɔkra ho mpo; Bun no twaa mo ho hankra sii; Po mu efuw brabraa me tsir."

column2: "Misianee kɔr mbepɔw ase tɔnn; Mekɛhɛɛn asamanadze na woguu me mpokyerɛ wɔ n'efiadze. Naaso ɔwo eyi me efi mona mu
"Me kra tɔɔ bitsi wɔ mo mu no
column3: mekaa EWURADZE: Na me mpaabɔ dur wo nkyɛn

column2: "Hɔn a hɔn enyi sɔ ator ehuhudze no Wɔpow hɔnara hɔn ADOM."

column3: medze ndaase ndze bɔbɔ wo okum afɔr; Mubotua dza medze abɔ anohoba no. Osiandɛ ɔwo EWURADZE
ma ɔkɛfee Jona too asaase wewew do."
